Pengangguran di Banten Tertinggi se-RI, Pemprov Salahkan Pendatang
06 Nov 2019, 08:00 by Bahtiar Rifa'i


Ilustrasi pengangguran/Foto: Fuad Hasim

Serang - Pemprov Banten menyalahkan para pendatang terkait tingginya angka pengangguran. Daerah ini menempati urutan pertama se-Indonesia dengan jumlah pengangguran 8,11% versi BPS atau 490,8 ribu orang. "Banten ini banyak tempat pencari kerja mengadu nasib, banyaknya urbanisasi dari luar Banten yang mencari kerja di sini belum terserap semua, menumpuk-numpuk sehingga menjadi angka pengangguran," kata Kepala Dinas Tenagar Kerja Banten Al Hamidi kepada wartawan di Kawasan Pusat Pemerintahan Provinsi Banten (KP3B), Serang, Rabu (6/11/2019). Setiap pasca lebaran dan kelulusan sekolah setingkat SLTA, bahkan katanya terjadi pelonjakan pengangguran yang bisa mencapai 7 sampai 10 persen dari jumlah total pengangguran di Banten. Data dari Disnaker sendiri, lanjut Al Hamidi ada 1,5 juta orang yang bekerja di Banten. Ia berdalih bahwa 70% merupakan pekerja yang datang dari luar daerah. Paling banyak, mereka yang datang dari Jawa Tengah dan Jawa Timur. Sebab itu, lanjutnya Pemprov Banten membuat Pergub Nomor 9 ahun 2018 yang isinya adalah industri harus melaporkan lowongan yang dibuka ke pemerintah daerah. Di Pergub juga diatur agar lowongan mengistimewakan putera daerah. "Tapi ini pun belum efektif, mudah-mudahan ke depan bisa menjawab. Hampir seluruh kalau di Banten, dari Jawa yang jelas itu, Jawa Timur dan Jawa Tengah," katanya. Di luar urbanisasi, ia juga berdalih bahwa 740 SMK di Banten kesulitan ditempatkan di industri. Khususnya mereka yang mengambil jurusan perkantoran dan bisnis. "Ini kejuruan dari SMK yang ini tidak dapat memasuki pangsa pasar, 740 SMK ini kebanyakan (jurusan) bisnis perkantoran, kan itu mau ditempatkan di mana," pungkasnya. Unemployment in Banten Highest in the Republic of Indonesia, Provincial Government Blamed Newcomers
Nov 6 2019, 08:00 by Bahtiar Rifa'i


Illustration of unemployment / Photo: Fuad Hasim

Serang - Banten Provincial Government blamed migrants for high unemployment. This region ranks first in Indonesia with a total unemployment of 8.11% from the BPS version or 490.8 thousand people. "Banten, many job seekers try their fortune, the number of urbanization from outside Banten who are looking for work here has not been absorbed by all, piled up so that it becomes unemployment," Banten Head of the Tenagar Work Department Al Hamidi told reporters in the Central Government Region of Banten Province ( KP3B), Serang, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Every post-Eid and high school graduation level, even he said there was a surge in unemployment that could reach 7 to 10 percent of the total number of unemployed in Banten. Data from Manpower itself, continued Al Hamidi, there are 1.5 million people who work in Banten. He argued that 70% were workers who came from outside the area. At most, they came from Central Java and East Java. Therefore, he continued Banten Provincial Government made Governor Regulation No. 9 of 2018 the content of which is the industry must report openings to the regional government. In Pergub, it is also regulated so that vacancies are privileged for the local sons. "But even this has not been effective, hopefully in the future we can answer. Almost all of it is in Banten, from the clear Java, East Java and Central Java," he said. Beyond urbanization, he also argued that 740 vocational schools in Banten had difficulty being placed in industry. Especially those who majored in office and business. "This is a vocational training program which cannot enter market share, 740 SMKs are mostly (majors) in the office business, where do they want to be placed," he concluded.
